modName: Life Like Glass - Armor Weapons Shields
summary: If you are looking for glass that you can actually see through, but doesn\'t look like it would shatter on contact, this is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
If you are looking for glass that you can actually see through, but doesn\'t look like it would shatter on contact, this is the mod for you!

I have now added a No Meshes version of this mod. If you are using some sort of Skimpy Armor mod that uses mostly Meshes, then these Glass Textures should apply just great using the No Meshes version. For anyone else using normal Armors, grab the With Meshes version.

-------------------------------------------------------------
The textures used in this mod were created by Joshawowo, I wish I could fully create textures myself, but thats a bit beyond my skill level. He has the best looking Glass Armor and Weapons textures I could find on all of the Nexus, but I was looking for a bit more transparency in the glass. So I modified the Alpha Layers on his textures to give the look I wanted. Anyways, here\'s links to the original mods I got the textures from, you can decide which look you prefer more, the images hosted here show Joshawowo\'s textures as \"Before\" and my Alpha changes as \"After\"

[URL=file.php?id=10751]REAL Glass Armor and Shields with realistic transparency[/URL]
[URL=file.php?id=9705]Icy Chillrend with transparency[/URL]
[URL=file.php?id=9892]REAL Glass Weapons with realistic transparency[/URL]
author: 1Kurgan1
